00106             function                get_fields_from_array( $Prefix , $Mode , &$Array )
00107             {
00108                   try
00109                   {
00110                         $Fields = array();
00111                         
00112                         foreach( $Array as $k => $v )
00113                         {
00114                               if( strpos( $k , $Prefix ) !== false )
00115                               {
00116                                     $Fields [] = $k;
00117                               }
00118                         }
00119                         
00120                         return( $Fields );
00121                   }
00122                   catch( Exception $e )
00123                   {
00124                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00125                   }
00126             }

00154             function                get_fields( $Prefix , $Mode )
00155             {
00156                   try
00157                   {
00158                         $Fields = array();
00159                         
00160                         if( $Mode & POST )
00161                         {
00162                               $Fields = array_merge( $this->get_fields_from_array( $Prefix , $Mode , $_POST ) , $Fields );
00163                         }
00164                         if( $Mode & GET )
00165                         {
00166                               $Fields = array_merge( $this->get_fields_from_array( $Prefix , $Mode , $_GET ) , $Fields );
00167                         }
00168                         if( $Mode & COOKIE )
00169                         {
00170                               $Fields = array_merge( $this->get_fields_from_array( $Prefix , $Mode , $_COOKIE ) , $Fields );
00171                         }
00172                         if( $Mode & SESSION )
00173                         {
00174                               $Fields = array_merge( $this->get_fields_from_array( $Prefix , $Mode , $_SESSION ) , $Fields );
00175                         }
00176                         
00177                         return( $Fields );
00178                   }
00179                   catch( Exception $e )
00180                   {
00181                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00182                   }
00183             }

00211             function                get_alias( $Name , $Predicates )
00212             {
00213                   try
00214                   {
00215                         foreach( $Predicates as $p )
00216                         {
00217                               if( strpos( $p , 'alias_' ) === 0 )
00218                               {
00219                                     $Alias = str_replace( 'alias_' , '' , $p );
00220                                     return( $Alias );
00221                               }
00222                         }
00223                         
00224                         return( $Name );
00225                   }
00226                   catch( Exception $e )
00227                   {
00228                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00229                   }
00230             }

00258             function                get_default( $Name , $Predicates )
00259             {
00260                   try
00261                   {
00262                         $Default = false;
00263                         
00264                         foreach( $Predicates as $p )
00265                         {

00267                               {

00269                               }
00270                         }
00271                         
00272                         return( $Default );

00276                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00302             function                allow_not_set( $Predicates )
00303             {
00304                   try
00305                   {
00306                         foreach( $Predicates as $p )
00307                         {
00308                               if( $p === 'allow_not_set' )
00309                               {
00310                                     return( true );
00311                               }
00312                         }
00313                         
00314                         return( false );
00315                   }

00353             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00354             {
00355                   try
00356                   {
00357                         if( $this->String === false )
00358                         {
00359                               $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00360                         }
00361                         if( $this->Settings === false )
00362                         {
00363                               $this->Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00364                         }
00365                         if( $this->Security === false )
00366                         {
00367                               $this->Security = get_package_object( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00368                         }
00369                         
00370                         for( ; $BlockParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 
00371                                                                                           'http_param' , array( 'default' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ; )
00372                         {
00373                               $this->Settings->load_settings( $BlockParameters );
00374                               $Name = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'name' );
00375                               $Type = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'type' , 'string' );
00376                               
00377                               $Value = '';
00378                               if( $this->Settings->get_setting( 'get' , false ) )
00379                               {
00380                                     $Value = $this->Security->get_g( $Name , $Type , $this->Settings->get_setting( 'default' , '' ) );
00381                               }
00382                               if( $this->Settings->get_setting( 'post' , false ) && $Value == '' )
00383                               {
00384                                     $Value = $this->Security->get_p( $Name , $Type , $this->Settings->get_setting( 'default' , '' ) );
00385                               }
00386                               if( $this->Settings->get_setting( 'session' , false ) && $Value == '' )
00387                               {
00388                                     $Value = $this->Security->get_s( $Name , $Type , $this->Settings->get_setting( 'default' , '' ) );
00389                               }
00390                               if( $this->Settings->get_setting( 'cookie' , false ) && $Value == '' )
00391                               {
00392                                     $Value = $this->Security->get_c( $Name , $Type , $this->Settings->get_setting( 'default' , '' ) );
00393                               }
00394                               
00395                               $Str = str_replace( "{http_param:$BlockParameters}" , $Value , $Str );
00396                               $Changed = true;
00397                         }
00398                         
00399                         return( $Str );
00400                   }
00401                   catch( Exception $e )
00402                   {
00403                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00404                   }
00405             }
00406       }
